distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libXpm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-43788: Fixed an out of bounds read when creating an image
  (bsc#1215686).
- CVE-2023-43789: Fixed an out of bounds read when parsing an XPM file
  with a corrupted colormap (bsc#1215687).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libXpm due to a boundary condition within the XpmCreateXpmImageFromBuffer() function. This flaw allows a local attacker to trigger an out-of-bounds read error and read the contents of memory on the system.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libXpm where a vulnerability exists due to a boundary condition, a local user can trigger an out-of-bounds read error and read contents of memory on the system.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
